ValidationRule.description: Expression with field name operator value OR expressionLeft and expressionRight
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(clcommon__Filter_Type__c, 'EXPRE'), OR( AND( ISBLANK( clcommon__Field_Name__c ) , ISPICKVAL( clcommon__Operator__c , '') , ISBLANK( clcommon__Value__c ) ) , AND( ISBLANK( clcommon__Expression_Left__c ) , ISPICKVAL( clcommon__Operator__c , '') , ISBLANK( clcommon__Expression_Right__c ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For EXPRE filter, either enter Field Name, Operator and Value or Left Expression, Operator and Right Expression
